sentences.english: I also think it makes Aunts "Associate Research Assistants ".
sentences.chinese: 偶想，小姨子也因此成了“研究员助理”。

sentences.english: The attrition have last year he transferred to the charge of the general affairs sister-in-law?

sentences.english: How do you think of the men's "sister-in-law complex"?

sentences.english: It was a night when she came to visit me in my aunt's house.
sentences.chinese: 那是发生在一个晚上，她来我小姨家找我。

sentences.english: She just was adopted by my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她只是当时被我小姨收养了。

sentences.english: Aunt and found then picked up the ax hit the past.

sentences.english: Today, I came back home from Xiaoyi .
My brother got pickled at his sister-in-law's wedding.
sentences.chinese: 我哥在他小姨子的婚礼上喝多了。

sentences.english: Today I went to Xiaoyi home, I start the morning, I bought a watermelon.
sentences.chinese: 今天我去小姨家，早晨我出发，我买了一个西瓜。

sentences.english: And is such a girl to be my nephew's sister?
sentences.chinese: 这样一个臭丫头，也配做我姨侄的小姨吗？
